name: South Kaio-shin
description: The Southern Kaio-shin was the ruler of the southern quadrant of the universe and was the most powerful among the Kaio-shin.

originPlanet.name: Sacred Planet
originPlanet.description: The Sacred Planet is the planet located in the Kaio-shin Kingdom where the Kaio-shin of Universe 7 reside. It should not be confused with the Core of the World. The Kaio-shin Kingdom, in which the planet is located,
